Installation¶

Python dependencies¶

  • Python (3.6 or later)

  • numpy (1.14 or later)

  • pandas (0.24 or later)

  • xarray (0.14 or later)

System dependencies¶

CDO

NCO

netcdf

Instructions¶

To install the development version of nchack:

$ pip install git+https://github.com/r4ecology/nchack.git

nchack
